The intelligence community: s conclusion that Russia tampered in the election and stole Democratic Party emails, including those from the DNC, and gave them to WikiLeaks.
The unsolved murder of Seth Rich: a DNC staffer who was shot and killed in July 2016, leading to speculation that he may have been the source of the leaked emails.
WikiLeaks: publication of tens of thousands of internal DNC emails shortly after Rich's death, which fueled conspiracy theories linking the two events.
The conflicting statements and retractio: who initially claimed that Rich had contact with WikiLeaks but later recanted his claims.
